T04D3911:13b-1: sam pritti bo dhi tsitta bh'a ba na au pa de sha warna sam gra ha /
T04D3911:13b-3: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man ngag yi ger bris pa /
T04D3911:13b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3911:13b-5: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i yi ge
T04D3911:13b-6: padma spungs pa zhes bya ba cung zad bri bar
T04D3911:13b-7: bya'o // shes rab snying rje ldan pa'i mis //
T04D3911:13b-8: 'gro ba mgon med rnams kyi phyir //
T04D3911:13b-9: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
T04D3911:13b-10: byang chub sems mchog rab bskyed nas //
T04D3911:13b-11: byang chub spyod pa'i 'gros chen gyis //
T04D3911:13b-13: pha dang ma la rab gus shing //
T04D3911:13b-14: rgan la sri zhu byed pa dang //
T04D3911:13b-15: mi yi chos lugs legs srung ba //
T04D3911:13b-16: 'di ni ya rabs spyod pa yin //
T04D3911:13b-17: mi 'tshe ba dang bden pa dang //
T04D3911:13b-18: byin nas len dang tshangs par spyod //
T04D3911:13b-19: 'dzin pa thams cad btang ba ni //
T04D3911:13b-21: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs mthong nas //
T04D3911:14a-2: kha na ma tho gnyis spong ba //
T04D3911:14a-3: 'di ni zhi ba'i spyod pa yin //
T04D3911:14a-4: 'di dag kun kyang blang bya ste //
T04D3911:14a-5: nges 'byung lam gyi yan lag yin //
T04D3911:14a-6: chos kun stong pa nyid rtogs pas //
T04D3911:14a-8: thabs mkhas spyod pa mtha' yas pa ;
T04D3911:14a-9: / nges 'byung mchog gi spyod pa yin //
T04D3911:14a-10: de yang thog mar 'di lta ste //
T04D3911:14a-11: don med rnam par bslu ba yin //
T04D3911:14a-12: 'jig rten chos la ma chags par //
T04D3911:14a-13: nags tshal la sogs dben par bsdad //
T04D3911:14a-14: sems nyid gdod nas ma skyes pa //
T04D3911:14a-15: rang 'byung dgon pa yin mod kyi //
T04D3911:14a-16: las dang po pa'i sems can gyis //
T04D3911:14a-17: phyi rol dgon pa thog mar bsten //
T04D3911:14a-18: de 'og sems nyid dgon pa btsal //
T04D3911:14a-19: byang chub snying po'i sa bon la //
T04D3911:14a-20: brten nas don chen 'di ltar sgrub //
T04D3911:14a-21: de yang thog mar tshad med blo //
T04D3911:14a-22: btang snyoms sa gzhi legs bdal la //
T04D3911:14a-23: byams pa'i chu bos rnam bcus la ;
T04D3911:14a-24: / rab tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
T04D3911:14a-25: snying rje'i sa bon legs par gdab //
T04D3911:14a-26: lta ba'i nam mkha' go phye la //
T04D3911:14a-27: byang sems myu gu thabs kyis bskyed //
T04D3911:14a-28: dngos grub lo tog rab btsal la //
T04D3911:14a-29: ma chags blo yis kun la skye //
T04D3911:14a-30: sbyin pa'i g-yab mos legs pos la //
T04D3911:14a-31: snyan par smra bas gtam byas te //
T04D3911:14a-32: don mthun pa yis bag phab cing //
T04D3911:14a-33: don spyod gros chen nges par gdab //
T04D3911:14a-34: dad pa'i chu bum rab thogs la //
T04D3911:14a-35: bdag gzhan sdig pa rnam par bkru //
T04D3911:14a-36: dran pa'i phreng ba mchog thogs te //
T04D3911:14a-37: yang dag gdams ngag gzungs su gzung //
T04D3911:14a-38: shes bzhin mar me lag thogs te //
T04D3911:14a-39: bag yod gom pa legs par bor //
T04D3911:14a-40: nad med sbyin pa'i lus la ni //
T04D3911:14a-41: tshul khrims gtsang ma'i gos bgos shing //
T04D3911:14a-42: bzod pa'i mdangs chen rab phyung ste //
T04D3911:14a-43: brtson 'grus yan lag legs bskyod la //
T04D3911:14a-44: ting nge 'dzin gyi khang pa ru //
T04D3911:14a-45: bsam gtan kha zas legs sbyar zhing ;
T04D3911:14a-46: / shes rab snang bas sgo phye ste //
T04D3911:14a-47: stong nyid ye shes khang chen la //
T04D3911:14a-48: khams gsum skye bo mgron mo'i tshogs //
T04D3911:14a-49: smon lam snying rjes pos nas su //
T04D3911:14a-50: thabs mkhas pa yi go rims bzhin //
T04D3911:14a-51: dam chos stobs kyis dga' ston bya //
T04D3911:14a-52: dad pa'i 'khor lo rin po ches //
T04D3911:14b-0: nyin mtshan @14b dge ba'i lam sna drang //
T04D3911:14b-1: tshul khrims btsun mo rin po ches //
T04D3911:14b-2: rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan phreng gdags //
T04D3911:14b-3: gtong ba'i blon po rin po ches //
T04D3911:14b-5: thos pa'i dmag dpon rin po ches //
T04D3911:14b-6: log rtog dgra yi g-yul ngo gzhom //
T04D3911:14b-7: ngo tsha shes pa'i rta mchog gis //
T04D3911:14b-8: nyon mongs bdag med sbubs su sba //
T04D3911:14b-9: khrel yod stobs kyi glang po ches //
T04D3911:14b-10: phyin ci log gi las rnams spang //
T04D3911:14b-11: shes rab nor bu rin po ches //
T04D3911:14b-12: bdag dang gzhan gyi re ba bskang //
T04D3911:14b-13: yon tan mtha' yas 'phags pa'i nor //
T04D3911:14b-14: nor gzhan phal pa sdug bsngal rgyu //
T04D3911:14b-15: thog mar dge bshes bsten pa yis //
T04D3911:14b-16: phyi nang chos kun slob dpon yin //
T04D3911:14b-17: nags sogs dus kyis 'gyur ba yis //
T04D3911:14b-18: 'dus byas mi rtag stong par ston //
T04D3911:14b-19: nag sogs rgyu 'bras so so yis //
T04D3911:14b-20: kun rdzob slu ba med par ston //
T04D3911:14b-21: ro dang rus pa chu shing sogs //
T04D3911:14b-22: phyi nang chos kun bdag med ston //
T04D3911:14b-23: kun la khyab pa'i nam mkha' [?] yis //
T04D3911:14b-24: don dam spros bral la sogs ston //
T04D3911:14b-25: rang bzhin yongs su shes pa'i blos //
T04D3911:14b-26: chags med mig gis phyogs su lta //
T04D3911:14b-27: de tshe yul na ci snang yang //
T04D3911:14b-28: sgyu ma bzhin du gos pa med //
T04D3911:14b-29: don gyi chos ni rtogs gyur na //
T04D3911:14b-30: tha snyad dag gis ci zhig bya //
T04D3911:14b-31: grogs mchog rnyed na shin tu legs //
T04D3911:14b-32: de lta min na'ang gcig pur gnas //
T04D3911:14b-33: bung ba rgyags lding glu len cing //
T04D3911:14b-34: ljon shing yal ga gar byed cing //
T04D3911:14b-35: bya rnams snyan pa'i skad kyang 'byin //
T04D3911:14b-36: bsil yab ngad 'jam phyags na g-yo //
T04D3911:14b-37: phu chu lhung rgyun sgra yang sgrogs //
T04D3911:14b-38: mdzes pa'i ri dags rgyug cing bskor //
T04D3911:14b-39: me tog tshogs ni dgod pa 'dra //
T04D3911:14b-40: tsandan spos sogs dri ngad ldang //
T04D3911:14b-41: dgon pa'i yon tan 'di lta bus //
T04D3911:14b-42: rang gzhan dag la phan 'dogs shing //
T04D3911:14b-43: lan la cung zad mi re ste //
T04D3911:14b-44: grogs mang rnal 'byor ci phyir skyo //
T04D3911:14b-45: 'jig rten phal pa de lta min //
T04D3911:14b-46: ji ltar nags kyi ri dags bzhin //
T04D3911:14b-47: rtsa ba sdong bu la sogs bza' //
T04D3911:14b-48: yang na bung bas me tog bzhin //
T04D3911:14b-49: yang dag 'tsho ba gtsang ma blang //
T04D3911:14b-50: yang na thabs mkhas bya bzhin du //
T04D3911:14b-51: sdig med gsog 'jog cung zad bya //
T04D3911:15a-0: ji ltar nags kyi dom bu @15a * //
T04D3911:15a-2: dro ba'i skyabs la brten par bya //
T04D3911:15a-3: yang na dman zhing mi mkho'i gos //
T04D3911:15a-4: yang na bsod nams stobs dang sbyar //
T04D3911:15a-5: ji ltar ri dags phyogs su bdas //
T04D3911:15a-6: bag phebs nas ni nyal ba bzhin //
T04D3911:15a-7: de ltar bla mas bstan pa yi //
T04D3911:15a-8: yang dag don la rnal 'byor bya //
T04D3911:15a-9: bying rgod dbang du mi btang bar //
T04D3911:15a-10: zhi gnas lhag mthong cha mnyam mo //
T04D3911:15a-11: nang gi zhi gnas ma rnyed kyang //
T04D3911:15a-12: phyi yi zhi gnas la brten te //
T04D3911:15a-13: ci nus pa yis chos spyod ni //
T04D3911:15a-14: nyin mtshan g-yel ba med par bya //
T04D3911:15a-15: de ltar bsod nams tshogs kyis ni //
T04D3911:15a-16: rang rgyud me long dag par 'gyur //
T04D3911:15a-17: de la dga' ba med par ni //
T04D3911:15a-19: the tshom med cing dad ldan pas //
T04D3911:15a-20: chos gcig nan tan byas pa yis //
T04D3911:15a-21: yon tan mtha' yas rab snang ba //
T04D3911:15a-22: lo rgyus bzang dang gzhung nyid mthong //
T04D3911:15a-23: de lta bas na yon tan gyi skabs nas kyang /
T04D3911:15a-24: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i 'byung khungs so zhes pa dang /
T04D3911:15a-25: blang ba dang dor ba'i dngos po'i bye brag phyed pa'i shes rab nyid do zhes pa dang /
T04D3911:15a-26: ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas
T04D3911:15a-27: kyi chos yang dag pa'i bar du yang yongs su
T04D3911:15a-28: rdzogs par bya'o // zhes pas bstan to //
T04D3911:15a-29: blo yang rgya mtsho lta bu la //
T04D3911:15a-30: spyod pa mtha' yas padma gsal //
T04D3911:15a-31: blo dman rdzing bu lta bu'i phyir //
T04D3911:15a-33: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i yi ge
T04D3911:15a-34: padma spungs pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa
T04D3911:15a-35: chen po rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa
T04D3911:15a-37: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po padma ka ra war ma dang /
T04D3911:15a-38: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
